{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3499198,"name":"","username":"jgarder","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/j/a183cd/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-02-01T19:52:00.670Z","cooked":"

howdy all!

i understand the smartdashboard and shuffleboard are being deprecated in '27. sounds great they are outdated.
but i have been searching the topics here on chief delphi and googled for an answer but just cant find it.

will edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.smartdashboard.SmartDashboard be removed entirely or just renamed to “SimpleNT” or something? because most example code i have found for FRC makes use of smartdashboard.putnumber() or .putdata() and many use .getboolean() and such from this library.

should our team start work on a NT handler so we can have easy access to put and get data based on a key because Smartdashboard.* is about to be removed?

im hoping the answer is that ive just missed a post about its replacement. let me know!

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":6,"updated_at":"2025-02-01T19:52:00.670Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":54,"reads":164,"readers_count":163,"score":302.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":484691,"topic_slug":"smartdashboard-being-deprecated","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":57486,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/smartdashboard-being-deprecated/484691/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true,"can_vote":false},{"id":3499243,"name":"Peter Johnson","username":"Peter_Johnson","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/peter_johnson/{size}/10417_2.png","created_at":"2025-02-01T20:30:48.904Z","cooked":"

The plan is to replace the SmartDashboard class with a general purpose Telemetry class with similar “flavor” in terms of ease-of-use (so not a straight rename, but with the aim of it being just as user friendly). This work has not been done yet, and the SmartDashboard class will still be available in 2026.

Thank you for replying. I Mentor two different teams, and they both have this behaviour, but we are struggling with GitHub because our school blocks it. I’m going to review the code to make sure they are setting up The sendable Correctly, and if it’s still a problem I will post code tonight from home. Since no one else is posting about this, and you have told me yours is working, I suspect there is no loss of support for smart dashboard
